001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003public interface IGyro {
004    double gyroHeading();
005
006    double gyroHeadingInDegrees();
007
008    double gyroHeadingInRadians();
009
010    void setHeading(double newHeading);
011
012    default void zero() {
013        setHeading(0);
014    }
015}
